Welcome To MPC

MPC (MERIAL PHARMA CORPORATION) is a leading Indian mesotherapy supplier. Our company offers a range of mesotherapy products which can be used either by injecting or in the less invasive way like in dermapen treatments.

Mission


We focus on providing innovative medical solutions for corrective and aesthetic applications that deliver visible results and long-term solutions. We work closely with aesthetic doctors, dermatologists, dermatological clinics and other health professionals to understand their needs and the needs of their patients. With a solid understanding of their requirements, we develop relevant products that offer solutions.

About our products

Mesotherapy is one of the best methods where you can keep your youthful look without the use of a scalpel. Providing to skin by Dermapen, Dermaroller or injections a specially selected vitamin supplements moisturises the skin, improves its condition , reduces wrinkles , prevent hair loss & stimulate fat loss. Such procedures involving an aesthetic medicine diametrically displace today surgical operations. Mesotherapy treatment is completely safe, non-invasive, virtually painless and the results are already visible after the first treatment.

Needle Mesotherapy

Needle Mesotherapy is a local, non-surgical care treatment; a syringe with a thin needle are made revitalizing and nutrients contained in vials ready for Mesotherapy or cocktails into the dermis via a small puncture in the skin surface. Needle Mesotherapy can also be accomplished using a special gun that will automatically feed programmed, safe doses of the substance into the skin. This method is completely safe, non-invasive and can be performed by cosmetologists.

Dermapen

Dermapen is another revolutionary micro-needling mesotherapy method. The Dermapen is an electrical device in the shape of a pen equipped with a disposable; replaceable head containing 12 very thin, pulsing needles. Together with the right serum or cocktail it tightens, lifts and rejuvenates the skin. The Dermapen method takes on an accupuncture technique to improve the skin appearance.

Advantages & Disadvantages of Mesotherapy

Advantages


• A gradual improvement in skin condition visible after the first treatment
•Naturally promotes collagen production for resurfacing and reduction of scars , wrinkles and stretch marks .
•High efficiency in the revitalization of the skin, hair loss, cellulite and stretch marks

•Treat problems of pigmentation in the skin .

•Short time of skin healing – in the case of roller and electroporation – about one day, the other

•Lasting effects

Disadvantages

•Discomfort or slight pain during the puncture, only needle mesotherapy (after applying local anesthesia, almost imperceptible) .

•Skin redness and slight swelling, lasting up to several hours after the procedure.

•Possibility of bruising or bruising at the site of needle insertion, which can persist for several days (not applicable Roller).

•To obtain a spectacular effect required series of treatments, repeated in regular time intervals .
